subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jair Jurrjens, a rookie right-hander, allowed one run in five innings yesterday to lead the host Detroit Tigers to a 4-1 victory against the Texas Rangers and a split of a day-night doubleheader.
snippet: Jair Jurrjens, a rookie right-hander, allowed one run in five innings yesterday to lead the host Detroit Tigers to a 4-1 victory against the Texas Rangers and a split of a day-night doubleheader.
